mcq.statement: What is the Difference between farther and further ?

options.a: \"Farther\" refers to physical distance, while \"further\" refers to metaphorical or abstract distance.
options.b: \"Farther\" is used for metaphorical distance, while \"further\" is used for physical distance.
options.c: \"Farther\" and \"further\" are synonyms and can be used interchangeably.
options.d: \"Farther\" is used in British English, while \"further\" is used in American English.
